Partner at Grassi & Co.
December 31, 2013, Derek was a client of Louisâ€™

I worked with Derek during the early stages at foursquare.  He hired my firm to provide audit, tax and consulting services.  Among many of his other charges, Derek was responsible for all financial accounting and reporting at foursquare during that period.  We performed the first audit for the company subsquent to its venture funding.Derek and I had a great dialogue leading up to and throughout the process.  Our audit proceeded on time and on budget, as planned, and Derek was a pleasure to work with.  He had kept the Company's books in good order and understood basic GAAP accounting and reporting.  Where complex issues arose, he asked the right questions and got up to speed quick or brought in the right resources.  He is smart, intellectually curious and has a high level of dedication.I look forward to the opportunity to work with Derek again.

Erin Rea
Creative Consultant at Back of The House, Inc
December 11, 2013, Erin reported directly to Derek

Derek is a fantastic manager and colleague with whom I had the pleasure of working for just over two years at Foursquare. He has a creative approach to problem solving, a knack for prioritizing tasks and projects, and a managerial approach that encourages his reports to grow.  In an extremely competitive real estate market, he secured a highly sought-after office space for Foursquare's headquarters, managed its expedited build out, and secured subtenants for 5 suites on an excess floor, all in under two months.  Nearly a year later, when a hurricane and super storm rendered the office and surrounding neighborhoods uninhabitable, Derek was able to secure working office space for the company's displaced employees overnight. Many other companies had to virtually shut down during this time, but his efforts allowed Foursquare to continue running as uninterrupted as possible. Though Derek and I were on opposite coasts, he was instrumental in facilitating communication and collaboration on projects.  In our time working together, we got two offices off the ground, migrated accounting systems, and maintained the company's finances, all while scaling operations from a team of 80 to 150.  I haven't encountered another person in my professional career who could succeed in all of these arenas.I absolutely hope for the opportunity to with Derek again sometime in the future and believe he would be a great addition to any team.
Erin Rea
